data.title: 8PL6883 (2710L8) Micro V Belt
data.meta_description: 8PM6883 (2710M8) Poly V Belt, M Section With 8 Ribs. Belt length of 6883mm/271.0"
data.text:
UPS / FedEx Express Delivery (upto 5kg) - £9.00

UPS / FedEx Express Delivery (5-10kg) - £10.00

UPS / FedEx Express Delivery (10-20kg) - £12.00

Royal Mail 1st Class (upto 1kg) - £4.00

Royal Mail 1st Class (1-2kg) - £4.75

Royal Mail 2nd Class (upto 1kg) - £2.50

Royal Mail 2nd Class (1-2kg) - £3.50

*Please note, orders despatched on Royal Mail DOES NOT include any tracking information. Please allow 2-3 days for 1st Class, and 4-5 days for 2nd Class services.

*UPS and FedEx tracking numbers will be available after 5:30pm on the date of despatch and will be sent to the email address provided when placing your order.

*All orders exceeding £100 value will qualify for FREE express delivery!

* Orders must placed before 3:30pm for the above despatch methods.

If you need to return an item, please call our customer service team on (+44) 1484 515360 or email us at [email protected].

You will need to provide the following:

Name

Order Number

Product Part Number

Date of Order

Returns are accepted within a 90-day period, and goods will only be accepted if the following criteria is met:

Goods are still in the original, undamaged, and unopened packaging.

The item has not been used, fitted, modified, or damaged.

You have notified us no later than 90 days since receipt of goods.

Any products or quantities that have been sourced specifically to complete your order will be exempt from our standard returns policy and will be subject to handling charges. The rate of the handling charge is dependent on our suppliers’ current rates.

Products such as timing belts and ribbed belts that have been cut to your specification are also exempt from our standard returns policy.

Products that are ordered in error can also be returned, however the incurred costs for shipping will not be refunded.

Once inspection of goods has been carried out, a refund issued to the payment method used to make the initial purchase.
